pullRequest.body:
---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: This looks good to me. I also have one concern (not specific to this PR), which would be problematic for some future applications: it is that `Quasicategory` may apply to object in `SSet.{0}` only. I think that the definition of the standard simplex, the horn, etc, should be generalized to arbitrary universes, because we certainly want to be able to study simplicial sets which arise as nerves of arbitrary categories, like Quillen's Q-construction applied to the category of vector bundles over a scheme, etc. (Such categories should be essentially small, but their "natural" universe parameters shall be larger...)
I completely agree that we should fix universes. My hope / gut feeling is that it should be easy to do orthogonal to my series of PRs that show that the nerve of a category.{0} is a quasicategory.

For the universe issue, I have started #9631 which is not too messy...

Thanks for this!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7481069247/job/20361860716)
Is it possible to extract from this proof the extensionality property that a morphism from a horn is determined by its restriction to suitable faces?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicTopology/Quasicategory): alternative statement of hornfilling condition
